description.value:
You become trained in Crafting and inventor class DC. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Inventor]{Inventor} skill feat, even if you don't meet the skill feat's requirements. Choose an innovation. You gain that @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Innovation]{Innovation}, though you don't gain any other abilities that modify or use that innovation, such as modifications or Explode.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have first gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.aAm6jY2k5qBuWETd]{Inventor} archetype.
